dialogue.text: [LOUD CROWD CHEERING]
Thank you, everyone! Thank you!
Man, it felt good to do that again. I haven't gone all RAVE like that since we met!
Oh, Sweet! I gotta tell you about what Smoky told me! He knows that these crazy transformation powers are all about!
Oh, that's wonderful! Do tell me all about it while we eat.
Right, right, we gotta head out quick!
Thank you, Togarashi Town! And thanks for the good vibes, you two.
Farewell. Perhaps we'll run into each other again in the future.
Here, just take my number, dude. Just drop a text my way if ya wanna meet up again.
Heh... much appreciated.
I take it that you enjoyed yourself too, Spicy?
AAHAHHAWAHAHAWAHAAAAAAAAAAAA!!! I FREAKIN' DID IT! YOU SAW THAT, RIGHT? RIGHT?
All that practice is starting to shine through. I'm proud of you, Spicy.
I BET I LOOKED SO COOL! I KNOW I LOOKED SO COOL! PLEASE TELL ME SOMEONE RECORDED THAT!
That's a likely possibility. Looks like we've garnered an audience.
Hey hey, everyone!!! Did you all like that? Wasn't I the coolest?
[AUDIENCE CHEER]
I know you guys are dying for more! C'mon, Smoki-doki! Let's make this crowd bask in the the warmth of the Flame of Togarashi Town!
Your spirit truly never yields. Let's give this all we got, Spicy.
Feast your eyes on this!
